key.name: dark-themes
key.summary: List of possible dark GTK themes.
key.description: A list of GTK themes that define "dark_bg_color" and "dark_fg_color" and should prefer those over "theme_bg_color" and "theme_fg_color" when applying a color theme to the MATE HUD.

key.name: enabled
key.description: If true, MATE HUD will run when invoked.

key.name: shortcut
key.summary: The keyboard shortcut used to pop-up the MATE HUD
key.description: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>".
